entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}{F813,1,415105}...Huh? Didn't think I'd run into a{F801}neurisher here. That's something you{F801}don't see every day.{F801}{F802}I could use someone to talk to. I won't{F801}snack on you, so come and talk to me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}{F813,1,415105}...Huh? Didn't think I'd run into a{F801}neurisher here. That's something you{F801}don't see every day.{F801}{F802}I could use someone to talk to. I won't{F801}snack on you, so come and talk to me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}{F813,1,415108}Huh... Hey, don't worry about it. I can{F801}just hang around here a while longer.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}{F813,1,415108}Huh... Hey, don't worry about it. I can{F801}just hang around here a while longer.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}You see that giant cocoon behind me?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}You see that giant cocoon behind me?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}It's hard to picture it now, but a long{F801}time ago, Shinjuku was the angels' turf.{F801}{F802}They kidnapped a bunch of kids and locked{F801}'em up in that cocoon.{F801}{F802}They said they were going to take them{F801}to a "new millennium."{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}It's hard to picture it now, but a long{F801}time ago, Shinjuku was the angels' turf.{F801}{F802}They kidnapped a bunch of kids and locked{F801}'em up in that cocoon.{F801}{F802}They said they were going to take them{F801}to a "new millennium."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}In the end, Kenji--who was a human at{F801}the time--and his crowd killed them all.{F801}{F802}Since then, the cocoon hasn't been{F801}touched... They let out the kids who{F801}were inside, of course.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}In the end, Kenji--who was a human at{F801}the time--and his crowd killed them all.{F801}{F802}Since then, the cocoon hasn't been{F801}touched... They let out the kids who{F801}were inside, of course.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}I thought I'd forget about it when I gave{F801}up being human, but maybe my sharp new{F801}sense of smell reminds me a lot...{F801}{F802}The smell of my rotting daughter, with{F801}the flies buzzing around her, coming{F801}from that cocoon...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Cheerful demonoid\0{F87A,146}I thought I'd forget about it when I gave{F801}up being human, but maybe my sharp new{F801}sense of smell reminds me a lot...{F801}{F802}The smell of my rotting daughter, with{F801}the flies buzzing around her, coming{F801}from that cocoon...{F801}
